About me

Student

Second year student in computer science and engineering at Politehnica University of Bucharest with a great passion for learning and understanding new technologies

Fast Learner

Ability to grasp new concepts quickly, Adept, Capable, Receptive, Versatile due to a strong curiosity and a intense passion for the STEM domain

Tech Addict

Enjoyment in learning new programming languages, frameworks, technology concepts in general and a general pleasure in seeing ideas and projects come to life

Science Medalist

Accumulated a total of: 2 Golden Medals, 3 Silver Medals, 1 Bronze Medal, 1 first place Trophy, 1 MEN 3rd Prize, 2 MEN mentions and 2 Honor Mentions in various contests and olimpiads in Physics and Mathematics

Science Passionate

Participated in numerous science experiments contests, often winning 1st place, public events, such as Researchers' Night, and interactive classes with younger students under physics and chemistry teachers at my highschool

Previous Next

Hobbies

Music

Music is a way to unwind while working, detaching from the outside world in order to either empower my creative self or to be able to imagine and better understand the subtleties of the work i'm undergoing.

This combined with learning an instrument, the guitar, further enhances my perception of the world.

Reading

Reading is a way to soothe my curious, eager to explore new worlds self, a way to understand the past and how it may affect the future. Seeing the world as it was, is and will be through another person's eyes can be a way to understand it better than having only your own perception.

Gaming

Gaming is the reason i started to grow an interest in the tech world. Seeing all the interesting, amazing things one could do with a computer, all the breathtaking projects and games that could be developed made me interested in programming and technologies that could lead me to create such a project of my own.

This passion quickly grew bigger than just the gaming domain and into the tech world.

Projects

  • Bash utilitaries - C

    Implemented the functionalities of grep, cut, sort and a mini-encryption program

    Go to project

  • Battleship - C

    Created the infamous game, battleship. The game has a visual interface created with the n-curses library

    Go to project

  • Mini-shell - C

    Implemented a copy of the shell with some basic functionalities, such as create fs (create the file-system), delete fs, touch, mkdir, ls, cd, pwd, tree, rm, rmdir and find using lists

    Go to project

  • Mini-max Game Algorithm - C

    Implemented the mini-max game algoritm, with its variation, alpha-beta pruning, depending on the number of players using trees (multiway)

    Go to project

  • Graphs - C

    Implemented some graphs, with the adjacency matrix and with adjacency lists, and implemented some algorithms, such as Dijkstra's algorithm using heaps, Prim's algorithm, DFS or BFS

    Go to project

  • Matlab Labirinth - matlab

    A simple exercise to practise matlab skills, using matrixes in order to predict the chance of a mouse to escape a labirinth doing a certain number of moves, using the compact form of the matrix instead of the normal, inefficient form

    Go to project

  • K-Means Clustering - matlab

    Implemented an algorithm that is used to divide a set of data into K smaller sets of data, each of them having only items which resemble one anothers characteristics (for example dividing some items into K colors)

    Go to project

  • Cat detection (Householder method) - matlab

    A mini machine-learning program, uses a learning set from which we make a vector that will be used to compare the pictures in the test set. This method uses the Householder transformation in order to solve the sistem which determines the characteristic vector, which will be used for each tested image, if the vector * the matrix of the image > 0 then the image has the searched characteristic

    Go to project

  • Cat detection (Gradient descent) - matlab

    It's the same principle as above, only using a different method, gradient descent, in order to optain the characteristic vector

    Go to project

  • PageRank - matlab

    Implemented the algorithm used by google to determine the importance of a page based on the number of links to that page on other pages and also the importance of each page linking to the page of which we try to determine the importance

    Go to project

  • Ristorante conFusion - html, css, js, jquery (Bootstrap)

    Developed a website, using Bootstrap 4, designed to be used by a restaurant. It has certain bootstrap elements, such as navbar, jumbotron, carousel, form, card or acordion. The website can be viewed at the following address

    Go to project
